title: Crime Alert 05.27.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.27.19
description:
LA County officials offer sizable reward to help solve cold case shooting of a child. Oregan man accused of sex crimes turns himself in after 23 years on the most wanted list. Texas legislators change sentencing guidelines for mentally illness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
